headline: What Analysts Say Is Shaping the Changing Story for PG&E
summary: PG&E’s stock narrative has seen renewed analyst attention, with the company’s fair value estimate holding firm at $21.23 per share and only marginal shifts in risk assessments and growth projections. This steady price target reflects analysts’ continued balancing of PG&E’s major growth opportunities against notable regulatory and operational risks. Investors should stay tuned for insights on how to monitor ongoing developments and remain up-to-date on shifts in the company’s outlook. Analyst...
